languages.text: Служители Адептус Министорум услышали зов и приступили к сбору священного похода очищения на Кьяву Гамма. Но понадобится много времени и сил, чтобы искоренить каждое пятнышко скверны, укрывшееся в темном уголке мануфакторума.

traits.locale_text: Служители Адептус Мунисторум услышали зов и приступили к сбору священного похода очищения на Кьява Гамму. Но понадобится много времени и сил, чтобы искоренить каждое пятнышко скверны, укрывшееся в темном уголке мануфакторума.

languages.text: The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.
languages.original_text: Служители Адептус Министорум услышали зов и приступили к сбору священного похода очищения на Кьяву Гамма. Но понадобится много времени и сил, чтобы искоренить каждое пятнышко скверны, укрывшееся в темном уголке мануфакторума.

traits.locale_text: The servants of Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade of purification for Kiava Gamma. It will take a lot of time and effort to wipe away every spot of corruption lurking in dark corners of the manufactorum.

The servants of Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade of purification for Kiava Gamma. It will take a lot of time and effort to wipe away every spot of corruption lurking in dark corners of the manufactorum.

The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

languages.text: 国教教会的仆人们听从了号召，组建起了一支圣教军来净化基亚瓦伽马星。不过，若是想彻底铲除制造工厂中的每一根腐化的触须，恐怕要消耗大量时间与精力。
languages.original_text: The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 国教教会的仆人们听从了号召，组建起了一支圣教军来净化基亚瓦伽马星。不过，若是想彻底铲除制造工厂中的每一根腐化的触须，恐怕要消耗大量时间与精力。

languages.text: Los sirvientes del Adeptus Ministorum escuchan la llamada y reúnen una santa cruzada para purificar Kiava Gamma. Hará falta mucho tiempo y esfuerzo para extirpar completamente la corrupción que acecha en el manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Los sirvientes del Adeptus Ministorum escuchan la llamada y reúnen una santa cruzada para purificar Kiava Gamma. Hará falta mucho tiempo y esfuerzo para extirpar completamente la corrupción que acecha en el manufactorum.

languages.text: Die Diener des Adeptus Ministorum folgten dem Ruf und organisierten einen heiligen Kreuzzug zur Reinigung von Kiava Gamma. Es wird viel Zeit und Mühe kosten, jede Ranke der Verderbnis auszurotten, die in den dunklen Ecken des Manufactorums lauert.
languages.original_text: The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

languages.text: Répondant à l'appel, les serviteurs de l'Adeptus Ministorum se préparent à lancer une sainte croisade de purification de Kiava Gamma. Il leur faudra cependant beaucoup de temps et d'efforts pour éradiquer toute trace de corruption nichée dans les plus sombres recoins du manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Répondant à l'appel, les serviteurs de l'Adeptus Ministorum se préparent à lancer une sainte croisade de purification de Kiava Gamma. Il leur faudra cependant beaucoup de temps et d'efforts pour éradiquer toute trace de corruption nichée dans les plus sombres recoins du manufactorum.

languages.text: 帝国宗務局の従者達はその呼びかけを聞き入れて、キアヴァ・ガンマを浄化するために聖なる十字軍を結成し始めた。聖工場の暗い隅にまで潜む腐敗の根っこを全て抜き去るには、多大な時間と労力がかかるだろう。
languages.original_text: The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 帝国宗務局の従者達はその呼びかけを聞き入れて、キアヴァ・ガンマを浄化するために聖なる十字軍を結成し始めた。聖工場の暗い隅にまで潜む腐敗の根っこを全て抜き去るには、多大な時間と労力がかかるだろう。

languages.text: Adeptus Ministorum'un hizmetkârları çağrıya yanıt verdi ve Kiava Gama'yı arındırmak için kutsal bir cihadın hazırlıklarına başladı. Manufaktorumun karanlık köşelerinde kol gezen yozlaşmışlığın her bir filizinin bulunup kökünün kazınması büyük zaman ve efor gerektirecek.
languages.original_text: The servants of the Adeptus Ministorum heeded the call and began to assemble a holy crusade to purify Kiava Gamma. It will take much time and effort to root out every tendril of corruption lurking in the dark corners of the manufactorum.
